title: Are The Heat Cooked?
description:
In this edition of (debatable) After Dark, Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Israel Gutierrez debate if it is clear to them that the Heat are cooked and what they expect the Nets to do with Kyrie Irving.

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Are The Heat Cooked For The Rest Of The Series?
